    • 字段详细资料

      • SPACING_AUTO

        public static final int SPACING_AUTO
        Special value for the child view spacing. SPACING_AUTO means that the actual spacing is calculated according to the size of the container and the number of the child views, so that the child views are placed evenly in the container.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • SPACING_ALIGN

        public static final int SPACING_ALIGN
        Special value for the horizontal spacing of the child views in the last row SPACING_ALIGN means that the horizontal spacing of the child views in the last row keeps the same with the spacing used in the row above. If there is only one row, this value is ignored and the spacing will be calculated according to childSpacing.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • SPACING_UNDEFINED

        private static final int SPACING_UNDEFINED
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • isFlow

        public boolean isFlow()
        Returns whether to allow child views flow to next row when there is no enough space.
        返回:
        Whether to flow child views to next row when there is no enough space.

      • setFlow

        public void setFlow​(boolean flow)
        Sets whether to allow child views flow to next row when there is no enough space.
        参数:
        flow - true to allow flow. false to restrict all child views in one row.

      • getChildSpacing

        public int getChildSpacing()
        Returns the horizontal spacing between child views.
        返回:
        The spacing, either SPACING_AUTO, or a fixed size in pixels.

      • setChildSpacing

        public void setChildSpacing​(int childSpacing)
        Sets the horizontal spacing between child views.
        参数:
        childSpacing - The spacing, either SPACING_AUTO, or a fixed size in pixels.

      • getChildSpacingForLastRow

        public int getChildSpacingForLastRow()
        Returns the horizontal spacing between child views of the last row.
        返回:
        The spacing, either SPACING_AUTO, SPACING_ALIGN, or a fixed size in pixels

      • setChildSpacingForLastRow

        public void setChildSpacingForLastRow​(int childSpacingForLastRow)
        Sets the horizontal spacing between child views of the last row.
        参数:
        childSpacingForLastRow - The spacing, either SPACING_AUTO, SPACING_ALIGN, or a fixed size in pixels

      • getRowSpacing

        public float getRowSpacing()
        Returns the vertical spacing between rows.
        返回:
        The spacing, either SPACING_AUTO, or a fixed size in pixels.

      • setRowSpacing

        public void setRowSpacing​(float rowSpacing)
        Sets the vertical spacing between rows in pixels. Use SPACING_AUTO to evenly place all rows in vertical.
        参数:
        rowSpacing - The spacing, either SPACING_AUTO, or a fixed size in pixels.

      • getMaxRows

        public int getMaxRows()
        Returns the maximum number of rows of the FlowLayout.
        返回:
        The maximum number of rows.

      • setMaxRows

        public void setMaxRows​(int maxRows)
        Sets the height of the FlowLayout to be at most maxRows tall.
        参数:
        maxRows - The maximum number of rows.
